Reviews.Title: Do not buy This
Reviews.Author: FNP12
Reviews.Content: I was so shocked when I received the phone. the phone was so dirty I was speechless. I had to return it right away.

Reviews.Title: blows android away
Reviews.Author: Mare3 "Mare3"
Reviews.Content: after 3 years of android becoming worse and more locked down with each new version, I switched to apple and after 3 months on ios I can't believe how much I was missing in terms of stability and it "just working."  No more Android for me.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected - if not better!
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: iPhone came within a couple days and met or even slightly exceeded expectations based on posted photos. As close to brand new I've seen!

Reviews.Title: It's thinner, lighter, four times faster & twice the memory of an iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: A1 Computer Consulting "a1computerconsulting.com"
Reviews.Content: It also has a longer screen with an extra row of icons.  Its screen looks much brighter than an iPhone 4 with the same brightness setting.  Also all iPhones are easier to learn & use than any Android and every other smartphone I've used before.  And I've been using smartphones since the first PalmPilot many years ago.  Apple also requires all apps to do similar things in similar ways.  So this makes it much quicker and easier to learn and use an iPhone, compared to any other smartphone.  It also makes it much quicker and easier to learn an iPad.  Since it's like a giant iPhone, with most of its features except for the phone.

Reviews.Title: The iphone5 makes people like me a Qudadriplegic more easily than havimg to type
Reviews.Author: RCA476mp
Reviews.Content: Really like this iphone 5 especially if your .Quadriplegic.Makes it easier to talk and use internet responds. Works great Thanks

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5 is THE BEST
Reviews.Author: Andy Bent
Reviews.Content: I have had every iPhone up to date. The 1st, 2nd, 3G, 3GS, 4, 4S, and now the 5. By far (and obviously expected) this iPhone is the very best of them all. Not by just small margins, no, the screen size, increased speed, double ram, and thinner form definitely show up and are much needed. Standards now, in fact. My only gripe is the new charger port. While I can see why they needed to make it, now I had to buy new cords and chargers. No deal breaker though. If you are on the fence, and love Apple devices, this is the device to buy (perhaps even when the iPhone 6 comes out).

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Jroman123
Reviews.Content: The iphone 5 is the nest thing that came out so far from apple. Great stuff and  a phone i recoomend everyone to get

Reviews.Title: Best 64Gb Iphone 5 ever, love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Arefa Vohra
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new iphone 5, 64Gb!!! Highly recommend this seller, they were honest, very prompt in answering questions, and delivered exactly what they had promised. I got my new iphone 5, and had absolutely no trouble activating it via AT&T.; I would definitely purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: so far so good...
Reviews.Author: cmae
Reviews.Content: with iphone you never go wrong, lets hope the new ios is as good as they announced, i will update soon,peace
